title: Cobalt-doped ZnO nanoparticles and PLD-deposited thin film forms: structure, optical properties and nature of magnetic anisotropy
content:

Cobalt-doped zinc oxide nanoparticles (NPs) were synthesized using a modified sol–gel method.
